homePage.name: M.Sadegh Hadipour
homePage.summary: A highly skilled and experienced front-end developer with over 4 years of experience in designing and developing responsive websites and web applications.
homePage.about:
Frontend Developer with 5 years of experience designing and implementing web application architectures from scratch to production deployment. Specialized in Vue (Options API & Composition API), Nuxt, and advanced TypeScript, with a strong focus on scalable architecture, performance optimization, and development of SSR and SPA applications.

Experienced in building e-commerce platforms, online booking systems, course sales platforms, and educational applications, including deployment and server management on Windows Server (IIS).

secondFreelanceDetail.1: Worked with some other JavaScript frameworks such as Angular, React, Vuetify.js, and Chart.js.
secondFreelanceDetail.2: Developed multi-language websites using i18n for localization.
secondFreelanceDetail.3: Enhanced the 2cgallery site, making it responsive for both Persian and English versions.
secondFreelanceDetail.4: Redesigned hitalki's teacher page section and added features to its management panel.

homePage.filioSummary: Filio™ simplifies saving and documenting site photos and videos for construction, inspection and more.

filioDetail.1: Collaborate with designers and back-end developers to create responsive websites and web applications using Vue, quasar and other front-end technologies.
filioDetail.2: Implemented UI designs using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and accessibility.
filioDetail.3: Working with google map api to add kml and kmz to the site’s map section.
filioDetail.4: Developed and maintained code libraries, style guides, and documentation for consistency and reusability.
filioDetail.5: Participate in code reviews and provide feedback on coding best practices and optimization techniques.
filioDetail.6: Troubleshoot issues related to front-end development, and work with the team to resolve bugs and performance issues.

fistFreelanceDetail.1: Enhanced skills through experimental projects involving form validation, router guards, state management, and responsive design.
fistFreelanceDetail.2: Developed backend systems using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.
fistFreelanceDetail.3: Projects available on GitHub.

homePage.superzSummary: Superz A search engine for supermarket products.

superzDetail.1: Implemented UI designs from the design team using Vue.js.

internDetail.1: Gained insights into the tech team's operations.
